poem:
Title: "Unsettled Notions on a Scratchy Airwave"

On the eve of clarity, dawn's taciturn news,
Sunak's voice on radio's ether infused.
Silencing the echoes, controversial disputes,
Anderson or Islamists - divides his repute.

On the chessboard of faith and political play, 
Unvoiced whispers transfigure the day.
In the silent gap between belief and speech,
Questions hover, answers out of reach.
